channel.title: Indiana Wesleyan University Athletic Department - News

item.title: [IWU] Whole New Wesley to be Revealed Tonight!
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- An epic night is in store for Luckey Arena this evening as a whole new Wesley Wildcat will be revealed during halftime of the men's basketball game with Judson.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Volleyball] Six Wildcats Honored in Crossroads League Volleyball Postseason Honors
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- Regular season and postseason tournament champion Indiana Wesleyan University had six members of the team recognized by the Crossroads League for their outstanding performances during the 2014 volleyball season.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Men's Soccer] Men’s Soccer Will Host Vanguard in NAIA Opening Round
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- Indiana Wesleyan University and Vanguard (Calif.) will do battle in the 2014 Men’s Soccer National Championship Opening Round, announced today in a release and video by the NAIA national office.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Volleyball] Volleyball Draws Cardinal Stritch in NAIA National Championship Opening Round
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- The NAIA released the pairings for the 2014 NAIA Volleyball National Championship Opening Round matches today. Indiana Wesleyan will host Cardinal Stritch (Wis.) at 3 p.m. on Saturday in Luckey Arena.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Men's Soccer] Albert Scores Early as Men’s Soccer Claims League Championship
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- It did not take No. 5 Indiana Wesleyan University men’s soccer very long to set the tone on Saturday night in a 3-0 victory over Goshen (Ind.) in the Crossroads League Tournament Championship match at Wildcat Field.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Volleyball] Volleyball Wins League Championship in Classic vs. Taylor
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- The cross-county rivalry between Indiana Wesleyan University and Taylor (Ind.) notched another classic as Indiana Wesleyan volleyball defeated Taylor 3-2 in the Crossroads League Tournament Championship match inside Luckey Arena.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Women's Basketball] Defense Fuels Women’s Basketball Win vs. SAGU
item.description: BARTLESVILLE, Okla. -- A defensive battle ensued at the Oklahoma Wesleyan Classic as No. 3 Indiana Wesleyan University women’s basketball defeated Southwestern Assemblies of God (Texas) by a 46-37 margin on Saturday in Bartlesville, Oklahoma
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Men's Basketball] Seven Wildcats Score Double Figures in Men’s Basketball Win vs. IUSE
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- The impressive early season success of No. 1-ranked Indiana Wesleyan University men’s basketball continued on Friday night as IWU routed visiting IU Southeast 107-68 in Luckey Arena.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Women's Basketball] Women’s Basketball Opens Oklahoma Trip with Win vs. Science and Arts
item.description: BARTLESVILLE, Okla. -- No. 3 Indiana Wesleyan University women’s basketball headed west for the weekend for a classic hosted by Oklahoma Wesleyan in Bartlesville, Oklahoma.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Volleyball] Volleyball Advances to Fifth Straight CL Tournament Championship Match
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- Indiana Wesleyan University volleyball is in familiar territory as they earned the right to play for the Crossroads League Tournament Championship on Saturday.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Volleyball] Volleyball Ranked No. 19 for Second Straight Week
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- The new Tachikara-NAIA Volleyball Coaches’ Top-25 Poll resulted in very few changes this week as 18 of the 25 positions were unchanged from last week. Indiana Wesleyan University was one of those that did not move as they are ranked No. 19 for a second straight week.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Men's Soccer] Men’s Soccer Holds Best NAIA Ranking in Program History
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- For the second consecutive week Indiana Wesleyan University holds the No. 5 ranking as the national office released the eighth edition of the NAIA Men’s Soccer Coaches’ Top-25 Poll.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Men's Basketball] Men’s Basketball Trounces #19 Cincinnati Christian
item.description: CINCINNATI, Ohio -- No. 1 Indiana Wesleyan University men’s basketball used one of the best first halves in program history to quickly dispatch No. 19 Cincinnati Christian (Ohio) 101-77 on Tuesday night in Cincinnati, Ohio.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Volleyball] Volleyball Easily Advances to Crossroads League Semifinals
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- Top-seed Indiana Wesleyan University had no problem advancing tonight as they quickly dispatched No. 8-seed Marian (Ind.) 3-0 in the Crossroads League Volleyball Tournament Quarterfinal match inside Luckey Arena.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt

item.title: [Men's Basketball] Marlin Chosen as Crossroads League Men’s Basketball Player of the Week
item.description: MARION, Ind. -- Indiana Wesleyan University junior point guard Jonny Marlin (JR/Greenwood, Ind.) was recognized today as the Crossroads League Men’s Basketball Player of the Week. The honor is the first in his career.
item.author: Kyle Schmidt
